DOC.detailed_description: OBJECTIVES : - Improve long term disease-free survival patient rare cancer high risk lethal relapse use myeloablative chemotherapy thiotepa , carboplatin , topotecan follow autologous bone marrow peripheral blood stem cell rescue . OUTLINE : Autologous bone marrow peripheral blood stem cell ( PBSC ) harvest . Patients receive high-dose thiotepa IV 3 hour day -8 -6 , carboplatin IV 4 hour day -5 -3 , topotecan IV 30 minute day -8 -4 . Autologous bone marrow PBSC reinfused day 0 . Patients receive filgrastim ( G-CSF ) IV twice daily begin day 1 . Patients follow 1 year . PROJECTED ACCRUAL : Approximately 50 patient accrue study within 5 year .
